text: Stokeley (titled STOKELEY) is the first studio album by American rapper Ski Mask the Slump God. Stokeley was released on May 11, 2018. On November 1, 2018, Ski announced that the name of his first album would be called Stokeley. The album has to be delayed because Ski wanted to work on it some more to make sure that it was up to his standards. The album debuted at #6 on the Billboard 200, selling 51,000 album-equivalent units. Stokeley would be certified Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The album features the single "Faucet Failure" which was released on April 9, 2019. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2018 albums Category:Debut albums
title: Stokeley
